title: Google\Cloud\Billing\V1\PricingInfo
name: PricingInfo
description:
Represents the pricing information for a SKU at a single point of time.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.billing.v1.PricingInfo

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.effective_time
params.description: The timestamp from which this pricing was effective within the requested time range. This is guaranteed to be greater than or equal to the start_time field in the request and less than the end_time field in the request. If a time range was not specified in the request this field will be equivalent to a time within the last 12 hours, indicating the latest pricing info.

params.name: data.summary
params.description: An optional human readable summary of the pricing information, has a maximum length of 256 characters.

params.name: data.pricing_expression
params.description: Expresses the pricing formula. See PricingExpression for an example.

params.name: data.aggregation_info
params.description: Aggregation Info. This can be left unspecified if the pricing expression doesn't require aggregation.

params.name: data.currency_conversion_rate
params.description: Conversion rate used for currency conversion, from USD to the currency specified in the request. This includes any surcharge collected for billing in non USD currency. If a currency is not specified in the request this defaults to 1.0. Example: USD * currency_conversion_rate = JPY
